name: Bunday Clean_85% (iOS13)
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
85% size. Install 'Bunday Clean' for normal character size.

Only compatible on iOS13. Separate packages for iOS10-12 and iOS14 are available.

Installed to: /Library/Themes/[fontname].theme/

Apply with theming engines e.g. SnowBoard. Package name = Fonts.

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet

1.2: Added support for 3rd party apps (Twitter, Spotify, YouTube, Discord)
1.1: Remade the variable ttfs for better effect
